Reviews.Title: Don't buy - horrible mousepad will interrupt everything you try to do
Reviews.Author: Ryan S
Reviews.Content: It is a very good computer. The only downside I've had is that sometimes the mouse freezes up for a half minute or so, I'm not sure why but otherwise it has been fantastic.Edit - while the price was great at the time, the mouse continuously freezes when I try to use it which interrupts work and is extremely inconvenient. The solutions I have found via the internet only work intermittently so for up to 10 minutes at a time I cannot use my mouse, and therefore what I can do with the computer is very limited. I would not buy this computer again, STAY AWAY if you do 3+ hours of serious work per day on it (you will eventually become as frustrated as I am).

Reviews.Title: Run Forest Run
Reviews.Author: Thomas Eldridge
Reviews.Content: Biggest disappointment I have ever had using Amazon. This thing was unusable weird error messages jumping from program to program saying programs weren't compatible. Neither HP, AMAZON or the SELLER "TAKE4LESS" wanted to help or take responsibility. Each said it was someone else. After much communication back and forth they took it back telling me they would test it and decide if I should get a refund. Stated restocking fee was 15% they charged a 21% restocking fee. So to  Amazon I am extremely disappointed in your assistance with this and Tiger Direct here I come. HP get some support people that speak english, and last but not least if you are ordering on Amazon and Take4Less is the seller RUN FOREST RUN as fast as you can away from the product.

Reviews.Title: Died after a little over 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: baseballfam
Reviews.Content: This laptop seemed decent with a much improved touchpad and pretty snappy version of windows 8 compared to older HP laptops. However, after hardly over 2 weeks (which coincidentally is the cut off of when it can be returned) it got the black screen of death.  I assume the hard drive crashed after it said no OS found when I attempted to boot the computer. However it happened, that is unacceptable in a new laptop and is disappointing because it seemed like a good value for a budget laptop. This was a very disappointing purchase, as now I'll have to deal with HP's customer support which has always been a hassle as I try to warranty this.

Reviews.Title: Good to me
Reviews.Author: heathert
Reviews.Content: I needed this to download pics from my camera and to download and burn movies from my video camera.  It does those perfectly.  Windows 8 takes 5 min to "get", but u just click on "desktop"and it goes to 7 easily.  Great buy for the price.  If u want to do more advanced stuff, I can't tell u.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: builder
Reviews.Content: The laptop all around is pretty awesome and you can't beat the price for it. I would recommend to buying this computer. Its fast has windows8. It is confusing at first but once you learn how to use it it's great.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: Had to buy a new computer when my old one quit turning on.  This one is great.  Windows 8 is easy to use if you go to the "Getting Started with Windows 8" app that is on the start screen.  Have been able to set it up just the way I want it and is easy to do what I need to do.

Reviews.Title: Nothing But Headaches
Reviews.Author: Richard R "richard_t"
Reviews.Content: I've had my HP Pavilion G6 for several months now and it has incessant problems.  I've had technicians look at it, I've had it fixed, and it STILL gives me various inscrutible "disk error" messages.  I've easily spent two or three times the purchase price on repair bills.  I'll never buy an HP again.

Reviews.Title: Not as fast as you would think, crashes sometimes, hate windows 8 without touchscreen
Reviews.Author: twinmom
Reviews.Content: I feel like this product is actually slower than my old G550 Lenovo.  I don't know much about laptops except what I read in my research so I went off of the processor speed. My old laptop was like 1.8 GHz speed so I thought this would be much faster.  I HATE windows 8.  My husband complains about it every time we use this laptop.  Better to buy a touchscreen if you have to get windows 8 since it's designed for that purpose.  I didn't want to pay the extra money for the touch option (and still don't).  I hate that if I open a pdf and then go back to the desktop to write a document, the pdf keeps popping up mistakenly.  I guess I'm doing something weird with the mousepad that makes that happen.  It happens repeatedly to the point of madness!!!  I also feel like the computer freezes a lot and I have to do a hard reboot.  I can't even get the cntrl-alt-delete to work.Keyboard touch is great.  Picture is great.  The appearance of the laptop is very nice.  Shiny black surface gets fingerprints but that's not a big deal to me.  The sound quality is better than my Lenovo so watching Hulu is a better experience.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy In Computers
Reviews.Author: prisrob "pris,"
Reviews.Content: My laptop finally bit the dust. I read all of the reviews on Amazon and elsewhere, and for the money, this HP Pavilion is the best deal. I needed a basic computer for home use. I am not thinking about traveling with the laptop, I use my iPad for traveling.It arrived well packaged. The instructions were clear. I was able to hook it up to my Wi-Fi with ease. The screen is very clear, and better than I had hoped. The 15.6-inch HD BrightView LED-backlit display provides good resolution and outstanding brightness and color. The touchpad is off center which is a little different, but was able to work around that without difficulty. I don't play films on my computer, but this one came with the Netflix app. I have used HP Pavilions frequently, so am quite used to their performance.It took me a while to get used to the Windows 8 OS, but I find I am OK with it. You are never too old to learn new ideas and work with new systems, it is the way of the computer world. You get used to it and adjust. The color on this HP screen is remarkable, and I am very impressed with the resolution.For the money, this is the best computer I have found. It is lightweight and compact. This computer does not get 'hot' like others. It has all the features I want and need. I like the previous HP computers I have used, and I am not too fussy. I want a computer that works well, has the features I use and need, and is dependable.The only complaint I have is that it comes with Norton Security, which I deleted.Recommended. prisrob 10-29-13

Reviews.Title: A sports car from a sedan.
Reviews.Author: Charles M Collins
Reviews.Content: This laptop is a fine running machine. I have used a desktop for years and decided to go a route of mobility. My old system was getting quite dated and it was just time to upgrade. The keyboard on this laptop is a pleasant upgrade in touch due to the lighter touch response. I am adapting well and liking it. The power of this machine is a pleasure to work with. Also Windows 8 is great. One thing about the keyboard is that when you type your thumbs get close to the keyboard mouse and can move your curser away from your task at hand, so be sure to tap the little divit in the upper left hand corner of the keyboard mouse to temporarily deactivate the mouse when you are typing for more than a word or two. Just double tap to reactive. All and all I love this new machine.

Reviews.Title: This is a great computer!
Reviews.Author: Alliie Crawford
Reviews.Content: It hasn't crashed since i got it last summer its a really good laptop. im using it for college and leisure and i have to tell you it's worth the price!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: J G
Reviews.Content: love it. no problems with computer itself. just hard getting used to windows 7. but will def recommend to everyone. thanks

Reviews.Title: Great laptop, but some trouble when starting it up for the first time
Reviews.Author: Kenny W.
Reviews.Content: Actually a great computer, fast and good for gaming. The only problem I've found with it was when I tried to start it for the first time, the video card shifted the main screen to an external one, so the screen on the laptop stayed off until I plugged the laptop to an external monitor and adjusted the video settings to make the laptop screen be the principal monitor. Other than that the laptop satisfies my expectations and will probably buy another laptop with an A-series apu (maybe not a Hewlett Packard)

Reviews.Title: This computer is truly a disappointment.
Reviews.Author: Chrissy
Reviews.Content: I've had this computer for a month or two.  The z key sticks.  Windows 8 isn't as bad as the millennium edition, but it's not good.  It tries to do too much.  Sometimes I just want to move my curser from left to right, that doesn't mean I want to open up a new menu.  I can't get the dvd player to work, the computer won't read dvds that I put in at all.

Reviews.Title: Great PC
Reviews.Author: S. B. Spence "Spence<><"
Reviews.Content: Great laptop for a great price. Once you get used to the Windows 8 operating system the laptop performs well. I maxed out the RAM with another purchase from Amazon and am now even happier with the performance. I could go on and on about the performance and things I like ,but, it suffices to say there is nothing to dislike about this laptop so far.

Reviews.Title: Very nice laptop
Reviews.Author: TalimSoul
Reviews.Content: I really love this laptop! The only thing on it that I don't like is the nortan virus scan. I put it on there and took it down as soon as I got it. It just clogs up the laptop. I still need a virus protector.. and I am still getting popups but it doesn't bother me one bit. The new windows 8 version thing, I never use. The sound on it could be a little louder but it's loud enough.Great deal for a great laptop. Had it for about a month? Starts up for only 5 seconds!!!

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Nicole Massie
Reviews.Content: It's not flashy or slim and the shiny frame is always spotty, but I'm not going downgrade this machine. It's been working perfectly fine for what I do, a little Minecraft, word processing, surfing, even photo editing and art. The keyboard is something quite well made, though I am not a person who needs the number pad so I wish that could have been used better. Still, some people can't live without the pad, so that great for them. The mouse touch pad takes a little getting use to because of the rough texture, but I hardly notice it anymore. Overall, well built for a decent price.

Reviews.Title: great laptop
Reviews.Author: Jared P
Reviews.Content: i spent lots of time researching a laptop that would do what i needed it to do. this is the result of the research. it  has more memory and etc than most that are more expensive. it also has the keypad on the side that other 15 inch computers don't. best buy if you are looking for a good laptop.

Reviews.Title: HP!! :)
Reviews.Author: Luana
Reviews.Content: I definitely underestimated this computer's ability. The sound is amazing, just like a mac, clear, loud and awesome. The graphics are also like a mac. I had a mac and sold it because I didn't want to deal with the office problems and the whole conversion issue with it so I decided to go back to a windows for school. It took some getting used to from the past couple of years but it's definitely worth every penny! I love my HP :)

Reviews.Title: Happy with my first HP laptop ever
Reviews.Author: Douglas A Knight
Reviews.Content: I always bought dell. What a nice change to purchase a great laptop from another company for a change. It is actually for my wife and, well, she was very VERY grateful for her gift. If you know what I mean. wink wink. I will look at HP for a laptop next time around.

Reviews.Title: I like it,
Reviews.Author: C. Dillahunty "bookwyrm"
Reviews.Content: but I don't like the mouse movement, but I am sure that if I buy a wireless mouse to go with this, I won't have problems.  I do not like the way windows 8 had to change around the locations of certain features. These features have been found I the same place for years, now all of a sudden you have to learn how to find it all, all over again,Plus, don't buy this if you do not plan on buying Microsoft office right away.  You only get a 30 day trail and then it shuts down.  There is no lower version of this that you can use for free like in windows 7.  The word processor is word pad, which is only good for typing up something right quick.The actual functioning of the p.c. however is just fine, and no problems there, just the movements with windows 8.

Reviews.Title: HP Pavilion Laptop
Reviews.Author: Just Old Guy
Reviews.Content: this is our 5th laptop in the family.  very fast.  plenty of space.  great screen.was worried about Windows8 being "different", but it's easy to get used to.the transaction and shipping went well, as usual.and the price was very good too.all in all, no complaints whatsoever at all.  it was a real good deal.

Reviews.Title: Acceptable price for decent laptop
Reviews.Author: Franklin Review
Reviews.Content: This laptop is hard enough, a big screen and a nice form. In general it has affordable specifications for smooth performance. Although, I think that sometimes is slightly heavy when it is running with windows 8.

Reviews.Title: Great specs for the price
Reviews.Author: Brenlon S.
Reviews.Content: I give this a five star rating because of the specs, and the performance is excellent too. It's an ideal back to school pc. Also, it's HP, so u can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Doing Well
Reviews.Author: Remo A. Zanocco
Reviews.Content: Kinda wish I had stuck with Windows 7 but this is ok.... so far so good, so far so good

Reviews.Title: Good computer
Reviews.Author: R. Lefever
Reviews.Content: Good system.....I will take the Hard drive out and put in a Solid State drive.  It is Suitable for my own use.Update....I absolutely think this computer is Great!  I'm finding that Windows 8 is so FINE :) So far I'm glad I bought it.  This is a 64 bit OS bad boy.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and powerful for the price
Reviews.Author: KKapil K.
Reviews.Content: Good laptop for the price. Powerful, and handles gaming well. Although the graphics card is dedicated it still isn't the most powerful one out there so don't expect it to handle all of the latest games with ease. However I'm currently playing Far Cry 3 on it, and on low to medium graphics it works well. My complains are with the web cam, which isn't very good, and with the keyboard which is very flimsy. I recommend using an external USB keyboard if you don't want to destroy the original one. Also upgrading the ram to 8 GB helps even more. Overall for a less than $400 laptop don't expect something of extreme quality, but it is an amazing offer.

Reviews.Title: For what I need...
Reviews.Author: Karie Silko
Reviews.Content: I needed a laptop dedicated to only one thing...my Audacity recordings.  It works perfect for it!  I have to admit, it sucked having to learn the new Windows 8 program but once I became familiar with it, I quit bitching about it!!  So far so good!!!

Reviews.Title: G6-2235us-  No need to see or write down the product key.
Reviews.Author: r2010
Reviews.Content: Some buyers wonder where the product key is for Windows 8 on these new systems.  An article about this question was written and states that the product key is now encrypted in the system BIOS.  Therefore the buyer or user of the laptop doesn't need the written key numbers anymore.  The article also states that the key isn't viewable when entering the BIOS.  This is probably not a problem for most users with the possible exception of system builders or other technical Windows users.  So even if you were to lose Windows 8 (or even the hard drive) you will always have a copy of the product key in the BIOS, and it is auto-verified without the user having to enter any numbers.

Reviews.Title: Great Computer
Reviews.Author: Robert H.
Reviews.Content: This is a great computer for the price.  It only comes with 4 gigs of Ram so I increased it to Eight. I was scared about Windows 8 from all the bad reviews that I had read, but I personally love Windows 8. Took me about a day to get use to, but then I could see how it is a great OS.  Great Computer!

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop. Awful OS
Reviews.Author: AOL Jack "AOL Jack"
Reviews.Content: This is really quite a nice laptop saddled with one of Microsoft's worst mistakes. Windows 8 is probably a pretty decent tablet OS. Unfortunately this laptop is not a tablet and the Windows 8 user interface is barely usable on a laptop. I am looking forward to Microsoft's release of a workable laptop user interface for Windows 8. I am really thinking installing Linux to simply get rid of Windows 8 might be a viable alternative at this point.

Reviews.Title: Works GREAT, LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: DaLeahWeathers
Reviews.Content: We bought two of these for our home business - one for my Wife and one for myself.  They are NICE, powerful little machines!  And the price was quite reasonable!

Reviews.Title: Good laptop
Reviews.Author: GIANCARLOS BRAY CASTELLANOS
Reviews.Content: This is a good laptop (so far at least) for those under a budget. It gets the job done and looks great. For the very tech savvy it is not as great, but for simple tasks, going online and doing your regular student activities it should be enough.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Bud
Reviews.Content: Terrific as a file and print server.  Fast and large capacity.  I upgraded RAM to 16 GB - highly recommended.  Windows 8 is not desirable.

Reviews.Title: good comp for money
Reviews.Author: Guy with two thumbs
Reviews.Content: Looks nice, types great. not thrilled with windows 8 but who is. full key pad is nice. Bought 4gb extra ram and installed computer runs great and smooth no real short comings so far

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: kevin in Sebastian
Reviews.Content: Arrived in a short amount of time in the original box. Easy as pie to set up even for a tech novice. Easy to find help and recognizes other devices easily. Windows 8 is great once you learn it. Comes with a short tutorial to geg you started. Im very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: User in Eastern NC
Reviews.Content: You can't go wrong with this one. Love it. You just have to learn to use Windows 8. No problem with practice.

Reviews.Title: Nice computer and very light
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: It is a great computer but it is easy to hit the mouse and it clicks on other things.  When you are ting you arm bumps where the mouse is and it does take longer to the work.  Otherwise i love the lightweight computer.

Reviews.Title: Nice Laptop
Reviews.Author: J. Kelly
Reviews.Content: Arrived fast, thanks to FedEx. Had a little issue at first, reconfigured,  works great now, took a little while getting used to windows 8. would have liked to have touch screen option, but beggars can't be choosers for the price paid.

Reviews.Title: Nice Computer for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Sheila F.
Reviews.Content: So far, so good! I've had my new HP for about 2 weeks now with no issues. Seems to perform as well as any computer would, so very happy, considering I only paid about $400 for it! Can't be beat!!! Main reasons for purchasing: had HDMI, has CD burner (this is not easy to find on an inexpensive laptop), fairly lightweight and perfect screen size!

Reviews.Title: fast and efficient
Reviews.Author: Daeyna Wiggan
Reviews.Content: firstly with the price of this item you cant go wrong, I mean it is fast and the features of this laptop are amazing. it was a bit challenging at first to get accustomed to windows * but after about 2 weeks it became natural.

Reviews.Title: Real value for money and does my work perfectly
Reviews.Author: W. S. J. Silva "Shanaka"
Reviews.Content: Real value for money I guess ... A basic Laptop but does day to day simple tasks .... which is enough for me

Reviews.Title: HP G6
Reviews.Author: Geoff Kahapea
Reviews.Content: I love it was delivered fast and pulled it out and I was wow. Really like the look hooked it up and was a little worried about the new features but after installing everything kinda like it. Feels like a blend on an iPad and computer.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Computer,
Reviews.Author: twhitney74
Reviews.Content: I love this PC!!!! It's exactly what I was looking for!!! Brand New, plus has all of the options that i really wanted it to have already installed on it... And the price was Unbeatable!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Very good product.
Reviews.Author: Nestor Lopez
Reviews.Content: great processor, great and colorfull screen, spatious keyboard, nice touch to the fingers, not so good sound but it exceeds my spectations by far.

Reviews.Title: Love HP, Hate Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Mark Smith
Reviews.Content: Great product, super price.  Very satisfied w/the laptop.  As stated in subject line: hate Windows 8.  Look forward to corrections on 8.1

Reviews.Title: The Best in its Class vs Samsung NP300E5
Reviews.Author: FLY 4 God "flyingbroker"
Reviews.Content: YES WINDOWS 8 is a poor upgrade and as I see outside of kids pretty much anyone coming from an earlier ver is struggling but DONT downgrade HP its an MS issue, so outside of this vs SAMSUNG you are getting a much faster computer, the touch pad on the HP is got ripples or indents vs Samsung smooth but guess what the HP is better, Samsung weighs 4.2 and HP at 5.2 I would have never thought, but unlike the samsang this laptop never gets hot and the fan is quite along with lower heat, the samsung blow heat, HP light warm,great job HP, neg. is that HP loads you down with add on programs can you say $$$ to them SAMSUNG was clean for the most part and easier, SAMSUNG is built well, looks good but a little older but nice HP smooth looking , better speakers and overall faster yes I compared side by side, both are great laptops, if you want a well built simple= Samsung If you want faster (slightly), runs cooler, sharper screen but not vibrant colors as SAmsung then the HP wins, also consider while its made in China HP is an AMERICAN co. , would rather keep my $ with a US co but this wasn't the deciding factor HP just overall was better.  You cant go wrong for under $400

Reviews.Title: Great so far
Reviews.Author: Douglas A. Price
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace a 4 year old laptop that was getting cranky.  So far, other than figuring out how to bypass Windows 8 for my wife, it's been great.  No, it's not a speed demon, but I wasn't expecting it to be.  It's just a solid little laptop for doing e-mail, surfing the web, and basic photo or document editing.  That's all we need it to be, and that's exactly what it does.I may up the RAM, but otherwise it's good to go as is.

Reviews.Title: WARNING!!!!
Reviews.Author: stefani
Reviews.Content: If you purchase this computer, you take a risk of it being corrupted. I received mine today. I am returning today. I opened it up and tried to set up. It gave an error message that windows could not be installed on this computer. I called hp and they said that there were some of these that have corrupted files and you have to wait for them to send you repair discs. Upon receiving those, you have to run the repair yourself. (Per hp) You should not have to fix a computer when it is brand new.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Marcus House
Reviews.Content: The price is great but you get Garbage.  Within 1 week of buying I see that the keys on the keyboard stops working.  You will hit a J and it thinks you are trying to do F2 or screen swap.  The only way to get out of this is to log off and log back in.  The hot keys at the top of the keyboard are swapped.  So F5 does not do refresh.  I have never been able to successfully connect wirelessly with my printer.  Now after about 2 years, entire folders disappear.  What do I mean by that?  Well you can go to Windows Explorer (file manager) and you can go to your My documents folders and you can see your "Kids" folder (as an example) but if you write a word document and then go to save it, the "kids" folder within your My documents folder cannot be seen.  So what I have to do is save it to my desktop and then move it manually to the kids folder.  This also means that for the most part if I want to send an email with an attachment I need to save to the file to my desktop to ensure I will be able to find the file to attach to the email for sending.  I bought this laptop brand new and before this I had a Compaq Presario CQ60 that went bad a few short years after buying brand new.  I am really starting to think I should avoid all HP laptops all together.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8 Hater
Reviews.Author: Edward V. Ohalloran
Reviews.Content: Another money maker for Microsoft. Pleased to advise that none of the Software that ran so well on yor Vista, XP or any other previos OS will not even load on Win 8. The price of the PC is small compaired to the cost you are about to incur re-prchasing MS Office, Adobe, Norton and all your favorite Software. Thanks HP for not offering an option for OS selection. Thanks Mr. Gates I know a destitute guy like you needs the money. And thanks to HP for your part in this yoking. As for me a refurbished High End Vista or XP machine will be just fine. As for the reviews that note the touch Mouse as sensitive, tell the truth it stinks like a dead rat. Do as much as breath on it and you have opened four Apps, erased all your Docments and started a System Restore. And this is a kind Review, I am unable to Post how I really Feel, there are Youth Here.Ed O

Reviews.Title: Not as bad as I thought that it would be!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: First of all, let me get this out of the way now.... Yes. Windows 8 is different. Yes, it would be better for a tablet. Yes, it is annoying, and Yes, I wish this laptop had vista instead. I had to first uninstall several of the programs on here (of course I instantly got rid of the bloatware), and then reinstall them in order for them to work (netflix, skype). Now that we are over that, lets get to how awesome this laptop is!!This laptop has many wonderful qualities!  The sound is absolutely amazing and will not require for me to have any additional speakers added even though I will set up my surround sound. The keyboard is a little bit smaller than I am used to, but I have quickly adjusted to it. It does have a number key pad which is good because I am constantly dealing with numbers. The screen is clean, and crisp, the webcam is just average though. I thought that it would be as nice as my logitech, but no. the touchpad is textured. This I find to like as most laptops I have used are smooth, this is really annoying because it seems that the slightest touch will move the cursor. This does not seem to be the case with this. Also with it being textured your finger doesnt.... stick LOL! The system is very fast, but I wouldnt think of this as a gaming system till you at least upgrade the RAM. It is expandable to 8GB. If all you do is go onto Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Amazon, blah blah blah.... AKA just surf and connect with friends, then this is an AWESOME laptop. If you are a gamer who wants something on the go, then feel free to get this one, but make sure that you upgrade the hell out of it.The body is a sparkly black, nothing to really write home to the family about, but it is nice. I will look forward to taking this device where ever I go!

Reviews.Title: ridiculously slow processing power
Reviews.Author: soni
Reviews.Content: I just bought this yesterday. Called to confirm ot wss in fact new and had a year warranty starting in may 2013....but it does not open files or tabs smoothly...a lot of other issues but that was main one. Extremely disappointed. Nicely packaged. Arrived next day and decent portability..but cant process any better than my five year old acer aspire. This a joke??

Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: Got this for our son for fall semester and it is great for his needs. Can't find a thing wrong with the laptop. I can recommend this definitely for the college students. Only downfall was it took longer that usual to arrive at the house

Reviews.Title: never recieved this lap top
Reviews.Author: Carolyn D. Triebenbach "rt16reg"
Reviews.Content: I can not comment of an item I never received I bought the Touch Smart Sleek Book as a second choice should have been my first choice

Reviews.Title: Pretty Sweet Computer
Reviews.Author: Rory B Bellows
Reviews.Content: I really like this laptop.  Windows 8 takes a while to get up on but I've gotten used to it.  Fast, intuitive and powerful.

Reviews.Title: Laptop failure
Reviews.Author: Ravesh Lalla
Reviews.Content: Bought this on behalf of a friend. He indicated that the on screen cursor using touchpad was prone to 'freezing'. He had to re-install windows 8 because the machine was perpetually running Norton anti-virus scans. It would appear the laptop has burnt out in just one month of use and is no longer starting.

Reviews.Title: computer
Reviews.Author: Alexandra Copland
Reviews.Content: pretty awesome and you can't beat the price for it. I would recommend to buying this computer. Its fast has windows8.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING.
Reviews.Author: Denise C.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this laptop to get rid of my old Dell and this one is WAAAYYYY better. It's very light weight. The only thing that bothers me sometimes is the sound the fan makes when it starts to overheat. It's probably my fault but it only overheats cause I'm on it like all day.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Ellen Nuciforo
Reviews.Content: love love love it great great very happy with it easy to use graphics are wonderful would recomend this to others

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: This laptop is spectacular! I wasn't expecting such a fast running and efficient computer for such a low price. You will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: HP Pavillon G6-2235us 15.6" Laptop
Reviews.Author: Omaima Aboul-saoud "Omfoof"
Reviews.Content: It is a great Computer at that price .It was well packed &  delivered in two days. It was very easy to set it up & the direction was very easy to follow.The only  problem for me was getting familiar with Windows 8! But once I start to learn it,  I kind of liking it. The screen has all the program are listing as an apps, all you do you click to open it. Also you can pin or un- pin  any of this apps to the task bar.ThanksOmfoofNJ

Reviews.Title: best for students
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: i am surprised windows 8 is so fun to use, and this laptop is the best choice for college students. it can even take over family desktops.

Reviews.Title: Like it but Don't expect too much.
Reviews.Author: Jesus
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer so I can stream movies to my Tv via HDMI and do some light gaming like minecraft. I like the boot time on windows 8 it clocked around 15 seconds. It feels well made, but the screen lacks the 1080p display. I was prepared for that at considering how much i bought it for. ($378) It can play some games like sims 3, most tycoon games. Minecraft. Vanilla skyrim at the lowest setting with about 15fps. The keyboard is very well made and feels very satisfying to the touch. The laptop and battery all together weigh around 5 pounds. I recommend this computer for the everyday user. But you might want to buy a new battery this one lasted me at around 2:30 hrs.

Reviews.Title: Worst computer I have ever had.
Reviews.Author: Gennifer McDermott
Reviews.Content: This is a horrible computer. "Has a mind of its own so to speak. You get what you pay for, and I wouldn't pay $1.00 for this.

Reviews.Title: Awful!
Reviews.Author: Heather Moore
Reviews.Content: It's hard to use, not user friendly at all. Every time I move the cursor the page changes or freezes up. When I'm on a web page 9/10 times I get the error message that the page has stopped working and it either refreshes the whole thing or shuts the page down. My screensaver only works about half the time. Instead of the screensaver coming on when the time has gone by, I get a solid orange screen that won't go away until I have hit 'enter' about 10-15 times or a message saying 'due to an error in the program, the screensaver can not work.'I wish I had never bought this laptop. The only reason I didn't return it is because I'd have to pay shipping and the stupid re-stock fee so I wouldn't get all of my money back anyway. I am hoping a friend of mine can work on it and get it in better shape so I can continue using it since I don't have the money for another one. My old laptop was nearly 8yrs old and worked better than this one. I got a new one because the hard drive finally wore out.Even sitting here typing this, the screen has frozen twice!

Reviews.Title: Love my new toy
Reviews.Author: Shirley Williams
Reviews.Content: Still working out quirks, but loving the instrument itself.  Windows 8 is exceptionally good, and the screen has beautiful color

Reviews.Title: User hostile
Reviews.Author: Bruce Bachelor
Reviews.Content: Windows 8 is definitely a user hostile operating system. . It takes much longer to get at what I want than previous systems Then for no apparent reason the screen shifts to something completely uncalled for. This acts like the beginning of a Beta test instead of a commercial product

Reviews.Title: Very nice.
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I like this one a lot. The apps screen was new to me, but now I know what apps are, and how they can be much faster than desktop windows. It's amazing how much data computers can store now, and that they can store data in the "cloud". But you have to wonder who and why some people are monitoring your online activity. Don't they have a life of their own? Maybe all they do is sit all day and look at a computer screen. If so, then they are the people who need to be watched. You can't sit inside all day all the time, and be mentally or physically healthy. The one negative thing about this product that keeps coming up, is the right side of the mouse pad. Every time the right side is touched, the settings, time, and date icons pop up, and if you don't stop and tap the pad, your window goes into the background. It's easy to get it back, but also very annoying to have to constantly bring your active window back up. There is no obvious way to temporarily disable the right side of the mouse pad.

Reviews.Title: Works great for what I need it for.
Reviews.Author: Carl Schmeklinberg
Reviews.Content: Received it quickly, and in great shape. The only disappointment was that I can't scroll up and down with the finger pad. I have to use the up, down key. That is the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: bugs there!
Reviews.Author: Yongmei Pan
Reviews.Content: I bought this labtop and found I couldn't creat new folders. I contacted the buyer but didn't find any useful information. The problem was fixed by removing the norton anti-virus software that was preinstalled with the laptop and was activiated upon we receiving it. I once contacted the buyer about return and refunding and was told that there will be a 20%-30% restocking fee charged if the laptop dosen't have any hard-ware problem. This purchase gave me the biggest headache since I started purchasing computers in this county ten years ago. By the way, Win 8 really sucks! If you just want to buy a regular laptop for your office work, avoid the Win 8 system!

Reviews.Title: Really affordable.
Reviews.Author: D.R.
Reviews.Content: It's at a great price........however in the first week of use the screen went from "a pixelated blue" to black and laptop didn't come back on for a few days....it's working again...glad i didn't have to return it

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: SN
Reviews.Content: I love it, except for the fact that I have to read up on how to use Windows 8.But in terms of the product itself, it's in excellent condition, super fast running and very sleek looking. :)

Reviews.Title: Simply the BEST!!!!
Reviews.Author: homesweethome57
Reviews.Content: Just picked one up for the office and I have nothing but PURE PRAISE for the laptop.  I already upgraded to more RAM and am feeling the power.  The DVD burner has been used already and produced a flawless disk.  Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Lem
Reviews.Content: I was a bit hesitant when ordering due to the reviews i saw. But product came before time and was new. No worries.Laptop itself is great.SpeedLightNice finish.I would recommend this PC for anyone who needs it for home use.

Reviews.Title: worst laptop ever
Reviews.Author: gotscrewedbyhp
Reviews.Content: Nothing works write, freezes and shuts down. HP has not responded to emails and when we call about our guaranteed return suddenly nobody is on ﻿the other end.to get a program to just write a simple letter, ﻿the app is $399.99 that is more then ﻿the laptop.

Reviews.Title: It's wonderful to use, runs great.
Reviews.Author: christine perez
Reviews.Content: However, thought the software windows 8 was preinstalled or there would be a card with the key number on it. Which I didn't receive. And will be calling up regarding same, as it is too expensive to purchase separately. Therefore, I thought I was getting a deal with this computer and am a bit upset and definitely unsatisfied if they don't send me the windows 8 key.

Reviews.Title: I WAS EXPECTING A BETTER COMPUTER FROM HP
Reviews.Author: Joe "D"
Reviews.Content: I RECIEVED THE COMPUTER IN GOOD AND NICE SHAPE , ALL SEALED AND ORIGANAL FROM FACTORY BUT REALY I WAS EXPECTING SOMETHING BETTER FROM HP , THE FINISHING , THE QUALITY IS NOT BIG DEAL , IT LOOKS LIKE SOMETHING CHEAP , I KNOW THAT HP USED TO MAKE BETTER THINGS , IT FREEZES 12 TIMES IN A DAY , IT IS TOO SLOW , REALY I WAS WAITING FOR BETTER PRODUCT , I CAN NOT RETURN IT BACK BECAUSE I LIVE OUTSIDE THE USA , THEN I HAVE TO KEEP IT

Reviews.Title: Good laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: Peter A. Goodwine "frogzilla"
Reviews.Content: I'm using this laptop as a media PC so my needs are very limited.It can run VLC on a 1080p movie without any problems.  I also stream HuluPlus and Netflix easily.I'm not a fan of Windows so my opinion is biased in that regard.Overall the hardware seems fairly lightweight compared to Macs.

Reviews.Title: woooooooo
Reviews.Author: wamazon
Reviews.Content: this product is the bees tits, its got plenty of space to save all those butt pics you be snaggin at dah mall

Reviews.Title: new beloved pc
Reviews.Author: SUPER DORK
Reviews.Content: I luv and carry almost everywhere I go mostly work though *sigh* dragon age marathons happytimes oh the rest works really awesomely too

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Siredward13
Reviews.Content: Has everything I was looking for and beds, great price, great computer, I am giving it a 4 because its like a good looking women , no one is a 10 so with the scale up to 5 , there is no perfect ....

Reviews.Title: HP Pavilion G6-2235us 15.6" Laptop (2.7 GHz AMD A6-4400M Accelerated...
Reviews.Author: Ken Webmaster About Facts Net
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop for a specific purpose and that was I needed a strictly Linux Machine, so I wiped Windows 8 off and installed Mint 15. It seems to be fine for this purpose.KenWebmasterAbout Facts Net

Reviews.Title: New Window's is a pain!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I got this computer & the computer it's self is fine.... the new Window's operating system is cumbersome on a laptop...  It's made for a tablet! I dont like it but I am getting more used to it... :-(

Reviews.Title: HP sells Defective Chinese Laptops in the US
Reviews.Author: Rudy
Reviews.Content: Yeah don't buy unless you want to keep sending it back to HP for defects and keep buying warranty. It's made in CHINA. HP knows that this is a very short term product and they are out to profit on the American Consumer to keep buying more warranties for their defective laptops.Good luck calling their Customer Service or Tech Support in India or Philippines. Super Stupid and Rude. All they care about is Ripping off the American Buyers. International business cheating by a company that should be BANNED from selling in the US and the Victim is the Poor American Consumers.

Reviews.Title: Very Good pc,
Reviews.Author: QQ "QQ"
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice laptop computer, but Windows 8 really IS NOT configured for a laptop - IT SHOULD BE ONLY ON A TABLET! I have no idea why Microsoft felt they had to mess with Windows 7 on a laptop.

Reviews.Title: HP G6 EXCELENT
Reviews.Author: eliezer
Reviews.Content: Very VERY VERY  good, excellent, I liked TOOI have done an excellent investment CONGRATULTIONSI AM VERY HAPPY AND GLAD

Reviews.Title: Hp lap top
Reviews.Author: manjula manoharan
Reviews.Content: This product of HP is not as much good as one I had before. Volume though it says Dolby not up to the mark. It takes long time while updating things.

Reviews.Title: I CANNOT FIND THE PRODUCT KEY - WHERE IS IT?
Reviews.Author: Victor C. Shikaputo
Reviews.Content: I WAS VERY EXCITED WHEN I BOUGHT THE LAPTOP. EVERYTHING LOOKED PERFECT. UNFORTUNATELY I CANNOT LOCATE THE PRODUCT KEY FOR MICROSOFT PLEASE HELP

Reviews.Title: A WINNER !!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: B. C. HUNT
Reviews.Content: JUST GOT MY NEW MONITOR SET UP AND I LOVE IT.  I REALLY LIKE THE SIZE AS THINGS ARE MUCH CLEARER.  DELIVERY WAS AS EXPECTED.  GOOD DEALS ARE ALWAYS HAD AT AMAZON.  SHOULD HAVE BOUGHT ONE OF THESE LAST YEAR WHEN I HAD TO REPLACE MY TOWER AFTER STRUCK BY LIGHTENING.
